pgrid.core.storage
Class StorageManager

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.storage.StorageManager

public class StorageManager
extends Object

This class represents the file manager for all shared and downloaded files. This class implements the Singleton pattern as defined by Gamma et.al. As there could only exist one instance of this class, other clients must use the sharedInstance function to use this class.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

addStorageListener

public void addStorageListener(StorageListener listener,
                               Type type)
Register a listener of events related to data items. Such listeners are notified when operations on items on the the current node are requested.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register
type - the type of data items that the listener is interested in

addStorageListener

public void addStorageListener(StorageListener listener)
Register a listener of events related to data items. Such listeners are notified when operations on items of any type on the the current node are requested.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register

matchLocalItems

public void matchLocalItems(Query query,
                            SearchListener listener)
                     throws NoSuchTypeException
Search the local data table for matching items. Callback is notified for new result.

Parameters:
query - the query used to specify the search
listener - an object to notify whith the result set
Throws:
NoSuchTypeException - if the provided Type is unknown.
